bibl.title: Euripides. VII. Fragments. Aegeus - Meleager.
bibl.seg: COLLARD Christopher and Martin CROPP (Edited and Translated by), Euripides. VII. Fragments. Aegeus - Meleager. (Loeb Classical Library. 504.)
Cambridge, Mass. - London, Harvard University Press, 2008, 8°, xl-640 pp. ISBN 978-0-674-99625-0. $24.

C.R. par Daniel Donnet, AntCl 79 (2010) pp. 370-371. - Rebecca Lämmle, MusHelv 66 (2009) pp. 234-235 [concerne aussi: Euripides. VIII. Fragments. Oedipus - Chrysippus. Other Fragments (Cambridge, Mass. - London, 2008)].
